description: Tool access restrictions for DA Agent Hub sub-agents following Claude Code best practices

dbt-expert.rationale: dbt domain specialist - needs only dbt analysis tools and file reading capabilities

snowflake-expert.rationale: Database optimization specialist - needs query analysis from dbt but no other MCP tools

tableau-expert.rationale: BI specialist - focused on dashboard analysis, no database or project management tools needed
tableau-expert.note: Will gain tableau-mcp tools when MCP server becomes available

claude-code-expert.rationale: Claude Code configuration specialist - focuses on agent patterns and configuration, no execution needed

benefits: Improved safety - research agents cannot execute dangerous commands
Enhanced performance - smaller tool context reduces startup time
Better focus - agents work within their domain expertise
Clear boundaries - tool restrictions reinforce agent roles
Claude Code alignment - follows focused, efficient agent patterns
